verses.verse: When <WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall bring<WH935> thee into<WH413> the land<WH776> whither<WH834> <WH8033> thou<WH859> goest<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it, and hath cast out<WH5394> many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> before<WH4480> <WH6440> thee, the Hittites,<WH2850> and the Girgashites,<WH1622> and the Amorites,<WH567> and the Canaanites,<WH3669> and the Perizzites,<WH6522> and the Hivites,<WH2340> and the Jebusites,<WH2983> seven<WH7651> nations<WH1471> greater<WH7227> and mightier<WH6099> than<WH4480> thou;

And when the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall deliver<WH5414> them before<WH6440> thee; thou shalt smite<WH5221> them, and utterly destroy<WH2763> <WH2763> them; thou shalt make<WH3772> no<WH3808> covenant<WH1285> with them, nor<WH3808> show mercy<WH2603> unto them:

Neither <WH3808> shalt thou make marriages<WH2859> with them; thy daughter<WH1323> thou shalt not<WH3808> give<WH5414> unto his son,<WH1121> nor<WH3808> his daughter<WH1323> shalt thou take<WH3947> unto thy son.<WH1121>

For <WH3588> they will turn away<WH5493> <WH853> thy son<WH1121> from following<WH4480> <WH310> me, that they may serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods:<WH430> so will the anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> be kindled<WH2734> against you, and destroy<WH8045> thee suddenly.<WH4118>

But <WH3588> <WH518> thus<WH3541> shall ye deal<WH6213> with them; ye shall destroy<WH5422> their altars,<WH4196> and break down<WH7665> their images,<WH4676> and cut down<WH1438> their groves,<WH842> and burn<WH8313> their graven images<WH6456> with fire.<WH784>

For <WH3588> thou<WH859> art a holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God:<WH430> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath chosen<WH977> thee to be<WH1961> a special<WH5459> people<WH5971> unto himself, above all<WH4480> <WH3605> people<WH5971> that<WH834> are upon<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the earth.<WH127>

The LORD<WH3068> did not<WH3808> set his love<WH2836> upon you, nor choose<WH977> you, because ye were more in number<WH4480> <WH7230> than any<WH4480> <WH3605> people;<WH5971> for<WH3588> ye<WH859> were the fewest<WH4592> of all<WH4480> <WH3605> people: <WH5971>

But <WH3588> because the LORD<WH3068> loved<WH4480> <WH160> you, and because he would keep<WH4480> <WH8104> <WH853> the oath<WH7621> which<WH834> he had sworn<WH7650> unto your fathers,<WH1> hath the LORD<WH3068> brought you out<WH3318> <WH853> with a mighty<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and redeemed<WH6299> you out of the house<WH4480> <WH1004> of bondmen,<WH5650> from the hand<WH4480> <WH3027> of Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt.<WH4714>

Know <WH3045> therefore that<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> he<WH1931> is God,<WH430> the faithful<WH539> God,<WH410> which keepeth<WH8104> covenant<WH1285> and mercy<WH2617> with them that love<WH157> him and keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687> to a thousand<WH505> generations;<WH1755>

And repayeth<WH7999> them that hate<WH8130> him to<WH413> their face,<WH6440> to destroy<WH6> them: he will not<WH3808> be slack<WH309> to him that hateth<WH8130> him, he will repay<WH7999> him to<WH413> his face.<WH6440>

Thou shalt therefore keep<WH8104> <WH853> the commandments,<WH4687> and the statutes,<WH2706> and the judgments,<WH4941> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee this day,<WH3117> to do<WH6213> them.

Wherefore it shall come to pass,<WH1961> if<WH6118> ye hearken<WH8085> <WH853> to these<WH428> judgments,<WH4941> and keep,<WH8104> and do<WH6213> them, that the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall keep<WH8104> unto thee<WH853> the covenant<WH1285> and the mercy<WH2617> which<WH834> he swore<WH7650> unto thy fathers: <WH1>

And he will love<WH157> thee, and bless<WH1288> thee, and multiply<WH7235> thee: he will also bless<WH1288> the fruit<WH6529> of thy womb,<WH990> and the fruit<WH6529> of thy land,<WH127> thy corn,<WH1715> and thy wine,<WH8492> and thine oil,<WH3323> the increase<WH7698> of thy kine,<WH504> and the flocks<WH6251> of thy sheep,<WH6629> in<WH5921> the land<WH127> which<WH834> he swore<WH7650> unto thy fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> thee.
Thou shalt be<WH1961> blessed<WH1288> above all<WH4480> <WH3605> people:<WH5971> there shall not<WH3808> be<WH1961> male<WH6135> or female barren<WH6135> among you, or among your cattle.<WH929>

And the LORD<WH3068> will take away<WH5493> from<WH4480> thee all<WH3605> sickness,<WH2483> and will put<WH7760> none<WH3605> <WH3808> of the evil<WH7451> diseases<WH4064> of Egypt,<WH4714> which<WH834> thou knowest,<WH3045> upon thee; but will lay<WH5414> them upon all<WH3605> them that hate<WH130> thee.

And thou shalt consume<WH398> <WH853> all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall deliver<WH5414> thee; thine eye<WH5869> shall have no pity<WH2347> <WH3808> upon<WH5921> them: neither<WH3808> shalt thou serve<WH5647> <WH853> their gods;<WH430> for<WH3588> that<WH1931> will be a snare<WH4170> unto thee.
If <WH3588> thou shalt say<WH559> in thine heart,<WH3824> These<WH428> nations<WH1471> are more<WH7227> than<WH4480> I; how<WH349> can<WH3201> I dispossess<WH3423> them?

Thou shalt not<WH3808> be afraid<WH3372> of<WH4480> them: but shalt well remember<WH2142> <WH2142> <WH853> what<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> did<WH6213> unto Pharaoh,<WH6547> and unto all<WH3605> Egypt;<WH4714>

The great<WH1419> temptations<WH4531> which<WH834> thine eyes<WH5869> saw,<WH7200> and the signs,<WH226> and the wonders,<WH4159> and the mighty<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and the stretched out<WH5186> arm,<WH2220> whereby<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> brought thee out:<WH3318> so<WH3651> shall the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> do<WH6213> unto all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of whom<WH834> thou<WH859> art afraid.<WH3372> <WH4480> <WH6440>

Moreover <WH1571> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will send<WH7971> <WH853> the hornet<WH6880> among them, until<WH5704> they that are left,<WH7604> and hide themselves<WH5641> from<WH4480> <WH6440> thee, be destroyed.<WH6>
Thou shalt not<WH3808> be frightened<WH6206> at<WH4480> <WH6440> them: for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> is among<WH7130> you, a mighty<WH1419> God<WH410> and terrible.<WH3372>

And the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will put out<WH5394> <WH853> those<WH411> nations<WH1471> before<WH4480> <WH6440> thee by little<WH4592> and little:<WH4592> thou mayest<WH3201> not<WH3808> consume<WH3615> them at once,<WH4118> lest<WH6435> the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> increase<WH7235> upon<WH5921> thee.
But the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall deliver<WH5414> them unto<WH6440> thee, and shall destroy<WH1949> them with a mighty<WH1419> destruction,<WH4103> until<WH5704> they be destroyed.<WH8045>

And he shall deliver<WH5414> their kings<WH4428> into thine hand,<WH3027> and thou shalt destroy<WH6> <WH853> their name<WH8034> from under<WH4480> <WH8478> heaven:<WH8064> there shall no<WH3808> man<WH376> be able to stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> thee, until<WH5704> thou have destroyed<WH8045> them.

The graven images<WH6456> of their gods<WH430> shall ye burn<WH8313> with fire:<WH784> thou shalt not<WH3808> desire<WH2530> the silver<WH3701> or gold<WH2091> that is on<WH5921> them, nor take<WH3947> it unto thee, lest<WH6435> thou be snared<WH3369> therein: for<WH3588> it<WH1931> is an abomination<WH8441> to the LORD<WH3068> thy God.<WH430>

Neither <WH3808> shalt thou bring<WH935> an abomination<WH8441> into<WH413> thine house,<WH1004> lest thou be<WH1961> a cursed thing<WH2764> like it:<WH3644> but thou shalt utterly detest<WH8262> <WH8262> it, and thou shalt utterly abhor<WH8581> <WH8581> it; for<WH3588> it<WH1931> is a cursed thing.<WH2764>
